long_description: The lightweight, quick-drying Sugoi RSR men's T-shirt offers maximum ventilation to keep you comfortable when pushing the pace during long runs in warm weather. Quick-drying fabric efficiently wicks moisture and increases overall breathability via open spaces between fibers; stretchy fabric offers a friction-free fit. Strategically placed mesh panels increase airflow by targeting body areas prone to overheating. Flatlock seams reduce chafing; inside taping around neck enhances abrasion resistance. Small pocket stores running essentials. The semifitted Sugoi RSR T-shirt is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight, quick-drying Sugoi RSR men's T-shirt offers maximum ventilation to keep you comfortable when pushing the pace during long runs in warm weather.
